site.title: Fandy & Rob — Wedding Weekend
site.description: Helpful information for Fandy and Rob’s seaside-inspired celebration in Somerset, including schedule, travel tips, and places to stay.

meta.location: Brent House Restaurant, East Brent, Somerset

hero.description: The reception will be held at Brent House Restaurant. We’ll raise a glass, share a meal, and celebrate together by the sea.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.intro: We can’t wait to gather friends and family for a relaxed seaside celebration in Somerset.

schedule.title: Wedding Day Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Timings from the PDF agenda

items.title: Reception begins
items.description: Arrive at Brent House Restaurant for drinks and welcome hugs.

items.title: Evening wind-down
items.description: Last orders and goodbyes as the reception wraps up.

schedule.note: We’ll update these timings closer to the date if anything shifts.

venue.title: Venue
venue.name: Brent House Restaurant
venue.description: Nestled just off the A38 in the Somerset countryside, Brent House Restaurant is an easy hop from Weston-super-Mare with plenty of parking on site.

travelTips.detail: Take junction 22 of the M5, then follow the A38 towards East Brent. Parking is available for all guests.
The nearest major station is Weston-super-Mare; from there it’s about a 13-minute taxi ride.
Apple Taxis in Weston-super-Mare offer local pickups and pre-booked returns.

travelStay.title: Travel & Stay
travelStay.intro: Weston-super-Mare is the best base for the night with plenty of seaside hotels and B&Bs. A few favourites from the PDF are below.

travel.detail: Complimentary parking is available at Brent House for all guests.
Weston-super-Mare has frequent trains from Bristol and London; plan around a 13 minute taxi to the venue.

stay.name: Travelodge Weston-super-Mare
stay.detail: Budget-friendly stop close to the seafront.

stay.name: Premier Inn Weston-super-Mare (Seafront)
stay.detail: Right on the beach – perfect for a morning stroll.

stay.name: Premier Inn Weston-super-Mare (Hutton Moor)
stay.detail: Next to the leisure centre with easy parking.

stay.name: Local B&Bs & seaside hotels
stay.detail: Plenty of independent spots – explore Sand Bay and Uphill for cosy stays.

stay.name: The Grange Inn, Brent Knoll
stay.detail: Closest accommodation to the venue on the A38, around a 15-minute walk or a quick taxi.

stay.name: The Fox & Goose, Brent Knoll
stay.detail: Country pub with rooms about a mile from Brent House – walkable if you fancy an adventure.

registry.title: Gifts
registry.intro: Your presence is genuinely the best gift. If you still wish to contribute, red envelopes will be available on the day in honour of Taiwanese tradition.

options.label: Red envelope
options.description: Bring a card or red envelope for cash or cheques.

items.question: What should we wear?
items.answer: Dress smart summer wedding – think light fabrics and layers for the Somerset breeze.

items.question: Can we bring children?
items.answer: Of course! Please include little ones in your RSVP so we can plan seats and snacks.

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.intro: Let us know you’re coming and share any dietary needs so Brent House can look after everyone.

gallery.title: Coastal Inspirations
gallery.intro: A mood board of the seaside vibes we love while we count down to June.

contact.title: Important People
contact.note: Reach out if you need anything for travel, timing, or local tips.

ics.title: Fandy & Rob — Wedding Reception
ics.description: Reception at Brent House Restaurant with drinks, dinner, and dancing.
